overview:
Gilad Shlang’s professional experience within the hi-tech industry stretches over ten years. At 23, he founded V-Promotion, a digital signing advertisement system specializing in customer behavior.

Gilad has since worked with several start-up companies as an Internet visionary, challenging the norms of site design and interface to bring user experience and personalization to a new level.

Previously to MeeMix, Gilad spearheaded the creation of the 888 Holdings Member Experience Department. In addition to his professional accomplishments, Gilad is an avid musician and a seasoned saxophone player.
